Articles.Content:
I have recently purchased Kerbal space Program as part of a steam sale for Ã‚Â£13.99 after loading it up for the first time I go into the game, But all the building's textures failed to load. So i quit out and try again.

After the second launch it stopped on LanderCabinInternals/model005. Im running on 32 bit windows 7, my graphics card is Geforce GTX 560 i have 8GB of ram and I have 100GB of free space left.

Please Help!![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)
Please see the stickied support threads Geoffry, we need more info from you ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
